issue.title: third party validation - multiples entries for the same order
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

When an order is done with a third party, the screen "orders validation" displays 9 times entries for the same order.
See screenshot attached.

Why ? (is it because we also have 9 possible status for the order ??)

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

OK, since issue seeems to be resolved. Thanks.
You can change status to resolved if you agree :-)
